allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 0: Initial project setup

- LICENSE \(MIT\)
- .gitignore \(comprehensive\)
- README.md with project overview
- CLAUDE.md for Claude Code context
- CONTRIBUTING.md guidelines
- Backend structure \(FastAPI\)
- Mobile structure \(Expo/React Native\)
- Environment examples \(.env.example\)
- ops_sync.sh automation script

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 3-10: Backend security foundation

- pyproject.toml with Poetry dependencies
- pydantic-settings configuration \(settings.py\)
- Security headers middleware \(HSTS, X-Frame, CSP\)
- CORS strict configuration
- Rate limiting with slowapi
- PII redactor for secure logging
- Custom exception handling
- Gemini client wrapper
- Chat schemas \(request/response validation\)
- Chat endpoints with rate limiting
- Health check endpoints
- API v1 router

Security: All inputs validated, secrets via env vars,
rate limits enforced, PII redacted in logs.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(backend\): Enable API v1 router in main.py

- Uncommented router import and registration
- API endpoints now accessible at /api/v1/
- Includes /api/v1/health and /api/v1/chat routes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(mobile\): Phase 2 - Mobile Core implementation

Complete Expo SDK 52 React Native setup with:
- NativeWind \(TailwindCSS\) + Cyberpunk dark theme
- Expo Router with file-based routing
- expo-secure-store for encrypted token storage
- expo-local-authentication for biometric auth \(Face ID/Touch ID\)
- 15-minute session timeout with auto-logout
- Secure API client with token refresh
- AuthContext provider with full auth flow
- Login/Register screens with input validation
- Tab navigation: Chat, Voice, Vision, Memory, Settings
- Chat screen with Gemini API integration
- Placeholder screens for Voice, Vision, Memory features
- Settings screen with biometric toggle and profile

Security features:
- Keychain/Keystore storage for tokens
- Biometric authentication support
- Session timeout on inactivity
- Secure HTTP client with HTTPS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(backend\): Phase 3 - Supabase Authentication

Complete authentication system with Supabase Auth:
- Supabase client wrapper with connection pooling
- AuthService for user registration, login, token refresh
- JWT token verification middleware
- Auth API endpoints: register, login, refresh, logout, me
- Request/Response Pydantic schemas with validation
- Password strength validation \(8+ chars, upper/lower/digit\)
- Rate limiting: 5/min register, 10/min login
- User-friendly error translations \(French\)

Security features:
- Bearer token authentication
- Secure password reset flow
- Rate-limited sensitive endpoints
- No email existence disclosure on reset

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
